nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Visual contact. The Prometheus is half-interred in the void’s wake. Hull stress harmonics are peaking. One wrong vector and we shear apart. The ship is... crying out in pain.

choices.text: Use the passage corridor we earned from the Watchers.
[Beacon Access] Sync with the beacon and ride its wake.
There's no safe way. Direct approach. Full power.
[Void Touched] The wake isn't just energy. It's a memory. Let me listen to it.

nodes.speaker: navigator_chen
nodes.text: Captain, that's suicide! The shear stress will tear us to pieces before we get within a thousand kilometers!

choices.text: [Leadership] "I know the risks, Chen. Do it."
"We can do this. Torres, divert all power to the structural integrity field."
[Previous Loop] "The readings are a lie. There's a stable corridor that opens for exactly 3.7 seconds. Time it perfectly."

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Following the Watchers' corridor. Minimal turbulence. The wreck’s docking spines are reachable.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Beacon handshake achieved. The wake is parting locally—like it remembers our purpose.

nodes.speaker: navigator_chen
nodes.text: A 3.7 second window? That's insane... but the Captain hasn't been wrong yet. Timing burn... now!

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Warning: entering the high-stress zone. Hull integrity beginning to drop. We need to navigate a field of shifting temporal pockets.

nodes.speaker: navigator_chen
nodes.text: I... I did it. We're through the worst of it. Hull integrity at 68%.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: We've struck a temporal distortion! Multiple hull breaches! Engineering, report!

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Breaches sealed! But we're dead in the water, Captain. Main power is offline.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Containment field is failing! The core is going critical! Goodbye, Captain.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Captain? Your vitals just spiked. The wake is… answering you. It shows us a path. A path of silence.

choices.text: No. We make our own path.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have safely reached the Prometheus wreck.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have reached the wreck, but your ship has taken a beating.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You survived the approach, but your ship is crippled and adrift before the silent giant.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Your gamble failed. The Meridian is consumed by the chaotic energies surrounding the Prometheus.
